## Stack() function

Stack in vertical direction Add a stack-split-child from 'stack.module.css' to the children to separate into top and bottom'

**Signature:**

```typescript
Stack: (props: JSX.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement> & {
    space?: string;
}) => JSX.Element
```
